column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=This weekend I decided to do something special with my son .
#id=2
#text=He been asking me to bake a cake with him so I figured today would be a good day to do so .
#id=3
#text=We went to the store and bought all the ingredients we needed .
#id=4
#text=We bought eggs , milk , cake mix , and even frosting .
#id=5
#text=When we got back home I took out my measuring cup and showed him how to measure how much milk we needed to add to the cake mix .
#id=6
#text=Then we both proceeded to crack a couple eggs and add it to the mix as well .
#id=7
#text=I gave him the hand mixer and he started mixing it all together in a large bowl .
#id=8
#text=I could tell he was having a great time .
#id=9
#text=After he finished mixing the the cake batter , I slowly poured it into a cake pan .
#text=I pre-heated the oven to 350 degrees and when it was hot enough I put the cake in .
#text=After 45 minutes of baking the cake was finally ready .
#text=We let it cool on the table for about 30 minutes then my son and I added the frosting to it .
#text=It was a beautiful looking cake and we were both proud that we made it together .
